body.name: [3 Pack] Screen Protector for Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, 3D Curved Full Coverage Soft TPU Film [Support Fingerprint Reader] Scratch-proof [Alignment Tool] Ultra-thin S22 Ultra Screen Protector
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 42 mins
features: 【Only Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G (6.8")】Include 3 Pack Flexible Soft TPU Screen Protector (Not Glass). Please confirm the model of your device first before you purchase it. Note: Watch the installation video before installing the screen protector.

【Support Ultrasonic Fingerprint & High Definition & Touch Sensitive】High Transparency S22 Ultra screen protector with ulrtra-thin design (0.16MM) with 99.9% light transmittance, bring bright and colorful image quality, keeping original visual experience for you. High-response Haptic Touch Technology gives "True Touch" feel, Support ultrasonic screen fingerprint.The visual effect and touch during use is as on the bare screen.

【Maximum Coverage & Self Healing & 3D Curved Fit, Case Friendly】Made of Premium thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU), a flexible material that can cover curved edges and Provide maximum protection against scratches. With nano-elastic and built-in 9H hardness material to prevent screen breakage caused by drops. Air bubbles and any scratches can be repaired automatically within 24 hours because of the use of a High-permeability glue with strong adhesion.

【Excellent Protection】 Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra screen protector is only 0.15mm with an oleophobic layer that can prevent water, oil, dust. High elasticity leads to "self-healing" ability, small scratches and bubbles will finally disappear.

【Easy Installation & Bubble-Free & Oleophobic Nano Coating】Coated with hydrophobic and oleo-phobic layer, Offer protection from dirty fingerprints, smudges, oils, and sweat. Provides position tools to help you install the screen protector easily without worrying about aligning the screen. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied, you will receive a replacement or refund or Lifetime maintenance & 24H Customer Service.
body.description: 3 Pack Galaxy S22 Ultra HD Flexible TPU Film-- Only compatible with Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 6.8 inch. NOT for any other Models.ATTENTION:1. Watch the installation video before installing the screen protector,The video is in the manual.2. If there are small scratches and bubbles after the screen protector is installed, don't worry and wait patiently, Use High-permeability glue and Strong Adhesion 5th Generation Hydrogel membrane, it will recover automatically within 24 hours.Product Feature:—Support Ultrasonic Screen Fingerprint and Compatible with Face Recognition. The ultra-thin design retains original High touch sensitivity and gives a "True Touch" feel.—Seamlessly Fit for Curved Screen, Flexible TPU material can cover the curved edges for maximum full coverage, Case Friendly with most phone cases.—HD Clear 99.9% transparency to remain the High-Definition image quality.—Hydrophobic and Oleo-phobic Coating keeps your screen from fingerprint,dust, water, or any other liquids, making it easy to clean, allowing for crystal clear viewing with this Galaxy S22 Ultra screen protector. Package:3 x TPU Screen Protector for Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra(Not Glass)3 x Wet & Dry Wipes,3 x Dust-Absorber,1x Dry Cloth 1x Non-Slip Pad,1 x Squeegee Card,1 x Positioning Tool 1x Instruction ManualIf you can't find the installation video, buy the wrong model of the screen protector, or have any questions, you can send the information to us through the Amazon Message Center.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not glass, so far great!
reviews.reviewText: Easy install, fits right, sticks well, no bubbles, not worried about tiny scratches which are not happening, all functions work. My search for screen protectors for my phone ARE OVER!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid screen protector
reviews.reviewText: Works well on S22 ultra, as with similar screen protectors for this phone it can be a little difficult installing. It takes some patience and includes instructions and link to video for install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS PRODUCT
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the easiest guided screen protector out! I love it and will repurchase over and over again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Screen shrinks and peels off.
reviews.reviewText: This screen was super easy to install and felt good on my screen. Unfortunately, after a couple of weeks, the edges started peeling, causing me to ha e to constantly press them back on. The whole screen has some how shrunk, leaving a 1/4 inch u protected gap at the bottom of my screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good screen protector, one of the best I've had. Very smooth, no bubbles, and easy installation. Follow their advice on the instructions and watch the video. It was very helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have tried so many screen protectors for my phone and they bubble and lift so dang easily. First install was BEAUTIFUL. Still haven't had any bubbles or lifting occur. Hoping they will have some for the S24 Ultra!
